meanings.sent1: The footballers practiced on the field every afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The footballers scored a goal in the match.
meanings.sent3: The footballers decided to play barefoot for fun.
meanings.sent4: The footballers were like warriors on the field, fighting for victory.
meanings.sent5: The image of the footballers running under the stadium lights stayed with me.

meanings.sent1: Many footballers gathered for the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The footballers' uniforms were all different colors.
meanings.sent3: The footballers formed a human pyramid for a team photo.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered as the footballers entered the stadium in unison.
meanings.sent5: The group of footballers looked like a colorful mosaic on the field.
